i1.name: Doom_'n_Gloom
description:
{{sbc|Passive - Doom:}} Periodically, '''Vex''' gains ''Doom'', empowering her next [[champion ability|basic ability]] to {{tip|knockdown|knock down}} affected enemies and cause them to {{tip|flee}} from her for {{pp|0.75 to 1.5 for 4|1;6;9;13}} seconds, during which they are {{tip|slow|slowed}} by {{pp|type=distance from '''Vex'''|60 to 99 for 11|250 to 800|key=%|formula=60% + 3.9% for every 55 units away from Vex}}. If {{ai|Looming Darkness 2|Vex|Looming Darkness}} triggers ''Doom'', all targets will {{tip|flee}} from its epicenter instead.
''Doom's'' cooldown {{sti|cooldown|resets}} upon [[death|respawning]].

{{sbc|Innate - Gloom:}} Nearby enemy {{tip|champions}} and {{tip|monster|monsters}} that {{tip|dash}} or {{tip|blink}}, as well as targets hit by {{ai|Looming Darkness|Vex}}, will be marked with ''Gloom'' for 6 seconds. '''Vex's''' next {{tip|basic attack}}, {{ai|Mistral Bolt|Vex}}, or {{ai|Personal Space|Vex}} against a marked target will detonate ''Gloom''. '''Vex's''' basic attacks against marked targets are {{tip|projectile|non-projectile}}.

''Gloom's'' detonation deals {{pp|30 to 140|color=magic damage}} {{as|(+ 20% AP)}} {{ccs|{{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}|magic}} and {{sti|cooldown|refunds}} 25% of ''Doom's'' cooldown. Against {{tip|monsters}}, this instead deals {{pp|40 to 60 for 5|1;6;9;13;16|key=%}} damage and {{sti|cooldown|refunds}} 10% of ''Doom's'' cooldown.
i1.descriptionHtml:
Passive - Doom: Periodically, Vex gains Doom, empowering her next champion ability to knock down affected enemies and cause them to flee from her for 1;6;9;13 ‒ undefined seconds, during which they are slowed by 250 to 800 ‒ undefined. If Vex's Looming Darkness triggers Doom, all targets will flee from its epicenter instead.
Doom's cooldown resets upon death.
Innate - Gloom: Nearby enemy champions and monsters that dash or blink, as well as targets hit by Vex's Looming Darkness, will be marked with Gloom for 6 seconds. Vex's next basic attack, Vex's Mistral Bolt, or Vex's Personal Space against a marked target will detonate Gloom. Vex's basic attacks against marked targets are non-projectile.
Gloom's detonation deals 30 − 140 (based on level) (+ 20% AP) bonus magic damage / magic">Unknown value: ccs / bonus magic damage / magic and refunds 25% of Doom's cooldown. Against monsters, this instead deals 1;6;9;13;16 ‒ undefined damage and refunds 10% of Doom's cooldown.
i1.notes:
* ''Gloom'' will mark {{ui|Rift Herald}} and {{ui|Rift Scuttler}} when they use their dashes.
* ''Gloom'' can mark {{tip|clone|clones}}, but not other {{tip|pet|pets}}.
* ''Gloom's'' mark has a very brief cooldown and refreshes on subsequent dashes or blinks nearby enemies use.
* ''Gloom's'' mark duration will refresh to {{fd|0.5}} seconds when '''Vex''' starts an attack windup against a target that has a mark which is about to expire.
* ''Gloom'' will mark enemies even if they are {{tip|untargetable}}.
* ''Gloom'' will mark enemies that are inside the detection radius when they blink, but will not mark those that blink inside from far away.{{bug|2}}
* ''Doom's'' cooldown starts as soon as the basic ability is cast.
* Non-champions (e.g. {{ui|Rift Scuttler}}) are not {{tip|knockdown|knocked down}} by the fear-empowered ability.{{bug|2}}
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will block all of ''Doom's'' effects but not ''Gloom's'' empowered attack nor mark.
* Nearby enemies that become displaced do not count for being marked by ''Gloom''.
* '''Vex's''' basic abilities use a different icon when ''Doom'' is off cooldown:
** [[File:Vex Mistral Bolt 2.png|20px|border]] Mistral Bolt
** [[File:Vex Personal Space 2.png|20px|border]] Personal Space
** [[File:Vex Looming Darkness 2.png|20px|border]] Looming Darkness

q1.name: Mistral_Bolt
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Vex''' launches a wave of mist in the target direction that deals {{as|magic damage}} to enemies hit. After travelling 500 units, the wave accelerates but has reduced width.
q1.descriptionHtml: Active: Vex launches a wave of mist in the target direction that deals magic damage to enemies hit. After travelling 500 units, the wave accelerates but has reduced width.
q1.notes:
{{Effect at cast time end}}
** ''Mistral Bolt'' will fire from wherever '''Vex''' is at the end of the cast time, towards the originally targeted location or 1200 units in the originally targeted direction if cast beyond that.

w1.name: Personal_Space
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Vex''' emits a shockwave around her before the cast time, gaining a {{tip|shield}} for {{fd|2.5}} seconds and dealing {{as|magic damage}} to surrounding enemies.
w1.descriptionHtml: Active: Vex emits a shockwave around her before the cast time, gaining a shield for 2.5 seconds and dealing magic damage to surrounding enemies.
leveling:
{{st|Shield Strength|{{ap|50 to 150}} {{as|(+ 75% AP)}}}}
{{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|80 to 240}} {{as|(+ 30% AP)}}}}
w1.notes:
* ''Personal Space'' can be buffered {{fd|0.1}} seconds before it comes off cooldown or becomes available otherwise.
* '''Vex''' can move during ''Personal Space's'' cast time.

effects.str:
• Shield Strength: (+ 75% AP)
  • Magic Damage: (+ 30% AP)

e1.name: Looming_Darkness
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Vex''' sends ''Shadow'' to the target location, creating a blast that deals {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|slow|slows}} enemies for 2 seconds. The blast radius increases based on cast distance.
''Looming Darkness will cast at max range if cast beyond that.''
e1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Vex sends Shadow to the target location, creating a blast that deals magic damage and slows enemies for 2 seconds. The blast radius increases based on cast distance.
Looming Darkness will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

effects.str:
• Magic Damage: (+ % AP)
  • Slow: %

r1.name: Shadow_Surge
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Vex''' sends ''Shadow'' in the target direction, granting {{tip|sight}} of the {{tt|area|Does not see into bush or across terrain}} along its path and dealing {{as|magic damage}} to enemies hit.
''Shadow'' stops upon colliding with an enemy champion, marking them for 4 seconds and {{tip|true sight|revealing}} them for the duration. ''Shadow Surge'' can be recast while the target is marked.
{{sbc|Recast:}} '''Vex''' {{tip|dashes}} towards the marked target with {{tip|displacement immunity}}. Upon arrival, the mark is consumed to deal {{as|magic damage}}.
If the marked target dies within 6 seconds of being hit by ''Shadow Surge'', '''Vex''' can cast ''Shadow Surge'' again at no additional cost for the next 12 seconds after {{fd|0.5}} seconds.
r1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Vex sends Shadow in the target direction, granting sight of the area along its path and dealing magic damage to enemies hit.
Shadow stops upon colliding with an enemy champion, marking them for 4 seconds and revealing them for the duration. Shadow Surge can be recast while the target is marked.
Recast: Vex dashes towards the marked target with displacement immunity. Upon arrival, the mark is consumed to deal magic damage.
If the marked target dies within 6 seconds of being hit by Shadow Surge, Vex can cast Shadow Surge again at no additional cost for the next 12 seconds after 0.5 seconds.
leveling: {{st|Impact Magic Damage|{{ap|150 to 350}} {{as|(+ 50% AP)}}|Total Magic Damage|{{ap|75+150 to 175+350}} {{as|(+ {{ap|20+50}}% AP)}}}}
r1.notes:
{{Effect at cast time end}}
* ''Shadow Surge'' grants sight of the area along its path for {{fd|{{tt|0.4|Estimated}}}} seconds each.
* ''Shadow Surge'' cannot be recast while {{tip|ground|grounded}} or {{tip|root|rooted}}, or if the target is {{tip|untargetable}}.
* ''Shadow Surge'' may also be recast if the target died to the ability.
* '''Vex' '''dash will track the target if they change locations.
** She will not stop tracking the target until she reaches them, as there is no maximum tracking distance.
* The following table refers for interactions while '''Vex''' is dashing:
** All movement spells are disabled during the first {{fd|0.25}} seconds of the dash.
{{ct|attack=false|move=false|cast=false|items=true,,,interrupts,interrupts,,interrupts|consume=true|spells=true,interrupts,true,true,false|interrupts=death}}
